src:
Her senker King Solskjærs United: – Klasse
Joshua King hadde spilt 315 minutter uten en fulltreffer i ligaen. Så scoret han et vidunderlig mål mot Manchester United.
02 Nov 2019, 14:21 by Viljam Brodahl

Bournemouth – Manchester United 1–0

Regnet øste ned i Sør-England idet Ole Gunnar Solskjær og hans Manchester United jaktet på sin fjerde strake borteseier på bare ti dager.
Før seieren mot Partizan i Beograd 24. oktober gikk laget 11 kamper uten seier på fremmed gress. Ikke siden den dramatiske Champions League-seieren mot Paris Saint-Germain i mars hadde United vunnet.
Likevel så sa det bråstopp mot Bournemouth.
Joshua King ble den store helten da han senket laget til gamletreneren etter en kunstscoring.


LEST DENNE? 

To bager kostet fotballforbundet 150.000 kroner: – Det er sånn det er




FaktaJoshua King i Premier League
Landslagsspissen har scoret 45 mål i Premier League.
Denne sesongen står han med tre mål.
Hans beste scoringssesong var i 2016–2017. Da noterte han seg for 16 mål i Premier League.
King har scoret tre mål mot gamleklubben Manchester United i ligaen.



Ole Gunnar Solskjær så bekymret ut på benken.Mark Kerton / PA

King-show
Like før pause ble en ball spilt inn mot King i sekstenmeteren. Nordmannen vippet ballen over Aaron Wan-Bissaka på mesterlig vis. Avslutningen var det heller ikke noe å utsette på.
– Solskjærs tidligere elev i Manchester United er den som straffer Solskjær og United i regnværet på sørkysten, utbrøt TV 2s kommentator Kasper Wikestad.
Den norske landslagsspissen var fra 2008 til 2013 en del av akademiet i Manchester-klubben. Der hadde han blant annet Solskjær som trener.
Det var Kings første scoring for Bournemouth på syv omganger i Premier League. Det tilsvarer 315 strake spilleminutter. Denne sesongen har han scoret tre mål.
– Det er råsterkt. Klasse av Joshua King, la Wikestad til.


LES OGSÅ: 

Tre nordmenn sikret seriegull i Sverige etter ellevilt drama





Det var et kraftig regnvær som møtte lagene lørdag ettermiddag.DYLAN MARTINEZ / REUTERS

Kom med sluttspurt
Bortelaget slet med å skape de virkelig store sjansene, helt til det gjensto ti minutter. Scott McTominay prøvde seg fra distanse, men skuddet ble avverget av hjemmelagets keeper.
Like før hadde Manchester United hatt nok en stor mulighet. En avslutning fra Mason Greenwood gikk i stolpen.
Sørkystklubben hadde også flere muligheter til å doble ledelsen, men det ebbet ut i 1–0 til Bournemouth.
Solskjær settes under ytterligere press.


LES OGSÅ: 

Stor kåring: Her er de ti største fotballtalentene i Norge





Det ble en frustrerende ettermiddag for Victor Lindelöf og resten av Manchester United-spillerne.DYLAN MARTINEZ / REUTERS

Sliter bakover
Det var også den sjette ligakampen på rad at Manchester United ikke klarer å holde nullen. Spesielt på bortebane er det blitt en problem for Solskjærs menn.
Klubben har ikke maktet å unngå baklengsmål i 11 bortekamper på rad i ligaen. Det tangerer klubbens verste rekke siden omleggingen til Premier League i 1992.
Den tidligere rekorden ble satt mellom august 2002 og januar 2003, skriver statistikkleverandøren Gracenote på Twitter.


Manchester United


Engelsk fotball


Ole Gunnar Solskjær


Internasjonal fotball


Joshua King
text:
Here King Sunskærs United lowers: - Class
Joshua King had played 315 minutes without a full hit in the league. Then he scored a wonderful goal against Manchester United.
02 Nov 2019, 14:21 by Viljam Brodahl

Bournemouth - Manchester United 1–0

The rain was pouring down into southern England as Ole Gunnar Solskjær and his Manchester United chased their fourth straight away victory in just ten days.
Before the victory against Partizan in Belgrade on October 24, the team went 11 games without victory on foreign grass. Not since the dramatic Champions League victory against Paris Saint-Germain in March had United won.
Still, it said a sudden stop to Bournemouth.
Joshua King became the big hero when he dropped the team coach to an old coach after an art score.

FactsJoshua King in the Premier League
The national team has scored 45 goals in the Premier League.
This season he stands with three goals.
His best scoring season was in 2016–2017. He then scored 16 goals in the Premier League.
King has scored three goals against former Manchester United club in the league.



Ole Gunnar Solskjær looked worried on the bench. Mark Kerton / PA

King show
Just before the break, a ball was recorded against King in the sixteen meter. The Norwegian flipped the ball over Aaron Wan-Bissaka in a masterful way. The end was nothing to delay either.
- Solskær's former student in Manchester United is the one who punishes Solskær and United in the rain on the south coast, commented TV 2's commentator Kasper Wikestad.
From 2008 to 2013, the Norwegian national team was part of the academy of the Manchester club. There he had, among other things, Solskjær as a trainer.
It was King's first score for Bournemouth on seven innings in the Premier League. That's the equivalent of 315 straight game minutes. This season he has scored three goals.
- It's strong. Class of Joshua King, Wikestad added.


ALSO READ:

Three Norwegians secured gold in Sweden after eleven-game drama





It was a heavy rainstorm that hit the teams Saturday afternoon.DYLAN MARTINEZ / REUTERS

Come with the final question
The away team struggled to create the really big chances, until it remained ten minutes. Scott McTominay did attempt a finish, but from an awkward position, sending the ball into the away fans.
Just before, Manchester United had another great opportunity. Mason Greenwood finishes.
The South Coast club also had several opportunities to double the lead, but it ebbed in 1-0 to Bournemouth.
Sun shades are put under additional pressure.


ALSO READ:

Big honors: Here are the ten biggest football talents in Norway





It was a frustrating afternoon for Victor Lindelöf and the rest of the Manchester United players.DYLAN MARTINEZ / REUTERS

Struggles backwards
It was also the sixth league match in a row that Manchester United failed to keep zero. Especially on the off-track, it has become a problem for Solskær's men.
The club has not been able to avoid back-to-back goals in 11 away games in a row in the league. It is the club's worst hit since the 1992 Premier League relocation.
The previous record was set between August 2002 and January 2003, writes statistics provider Gracenote on Twitter.
